titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

bill.summary: 9/29/2006--Introduced. Directs the Chairman and Ranking Minority Member of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to: (1) immediately appoint a Subcommittee, pursuant to Rule 19 of the Rules of the Committee, to fully and expeditiously determine the facts connected with Representative Mark Foley's conduct and the response thereto; and (2) make a preliminary report within 10 days.
